content: weave in loose end body in grey work in continuous spiral start with magic_ring 1 6sc into the magic_ring 6 2 2sc in each st 12 3 *single_crochet increase* repeat around 18 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* repeat around 24 5 *increase single_crochet in each of next 3 st s * repeat around 30 6 single_crochet in each st 30 7 single_crochet in each st 30 8 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 3 st s * repeat around 24 9 single_crochet in each st 24 10 single_crochet in each st 24 11 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 2 st s * repeat around 18 12 single_crochet in each st 18 start stuffing the body 13 *decrease single_crochet* repeat around 12 14 single_crochet in each st 12 stuff the rest of the body fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing ear make 2 work in continuous spiral start with magic_ring 1 6sc into the magic_ring 6 2 2sc in each st 12 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing christmas mice santa s sleigh pattern by uljana semikrasa treble_crochet trinkets 2014 type text page 2 arm make 2 first few rounds start with a chain and end with a slip_stitch followed by continuous spiral rounds start with magic_ring 1 in light pink 6st into the magic_ring slip_stitch 6 2 ch1 single_crochet in each st slip_stitch 6 3 ch1 *decrease single_crochet* repeat around slip_stitch 4 change colour grey 4 ch1 single_crochet in each st 4 5 single_crochet in each st 4 6 -10 repeat round 5 4 11 single_crochet in the next 2 slip_stitch 2 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing foot make 2 work in continuous spiral in the back loop only start with magic_ring 1 6sc into the magic_ring 6 2 back loop only single_crochet in each st 6 3 -5 back loop only single_crochet in each st 6 fasten_off using a needle weave the tail through the front loops of the last 6 st s pull tightly and close the opening leave a tail for sewing tail chain 18 and slip_stitch back in each chain across fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing santa s hat in red work in continuous spiral start with magic_ring 1 6sc into the magic_ring 6 2 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* repeat around 8 3 single_crochet in each st around 8 4 *increase single_crochet in each of next 3 st s * repeat around 10 5 single_crochet in each st around 10 6 *increase single_crochet in each of next 4 st s * repeat around 12 7 single_crochet in each st around 12 8 *increase single_crochet in each of next 3 st s * repeat around 15 9 single_crochet in each st around 15 10 *increase single_crochet in each of next 4 st s * repeat around 18 11 single_crochet in each st around 18 12 *increase single_crochet in each of next 2 st s * repeat around 24 13 single_crochet in each st around 24 14 -16 single_crochet in each st around 24 change colour
